page.title: 071st Day. Life of a street
page.content: The lonely day --------------- Cold,damp,windy morning,trudging along, getting nowhere. People pushing to get out of the rain. Crowding buses, splashing water, up on the pavement. Traffic jams on the lonely damp streets. The streets are cold and busy places. Rushing people driving to work, Little children running to school, wellies sloshing, kicking up water. Soggy socks and cold damp feet. Umbrella's bashing, poking, prodding, people running, driving, walking. Children playing, quickly moving, the streets are cold and busy places, running noses cold damp feet. kids on the dole, sitting in parks, the streets are cold and busy places. Tramps on benches, small dogs bark. The streets are cold and lonely places, for them......
